name: ABSOLUTION (Baggs)
description:
A rogue-like top-down shooter in which you play as Lyna, a woman with a tortured past.  Stuck in her own Purgatory, she must fight her demons with the help of a guardian angel, empowering him with each try.

Controls are made for AZERTY keyboards.

Made in a month as a final project for my second year at GameSup, Lyon. I worked as the sole programmer with a team of 4 designers and 5 artists (credits are in-game).
